short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Pinterest images from Ecosia image search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A particularly annoying thing (for me, anyway) is getting Pinterest images returned when I perform an image search on Ecosia. It's annoying on Google too, but there's already an extension to deal with that.

The simple fact is that Pinterest images pollute image search results. If you don't have a Pinterest account, then they are a walled garden, impossible to access and time-wasting. So, yes. It's yet another extension born out of deep-seated, existential rage!

NotPinterested for Ecosia saves time by removing Pinterest content from Ecosia image search results.

It can be enabled or disabled via the browser icon.
